Hi!
In this update, we have added the “schedule” screen. In this screen you will see an historical overview of your treatments broken into body areas. You find it via the hamburger menu.
Enjoy using the app!

We regularly update the Philips Lumea app for our users to make it even better! Download the latest version now. We don’t want you to miss out! Here are just some of the exciting additions to this latest version:

- Improved onboarding and performance
- The app is now available in Bulgarian
- Improved translations

We regularly update the Philips Lumea app for our users to make it even better! Download the latest version now. We don’t want you to miss out! Here are just some of the exciting additions to this latest version:

- Improved onboarding and performance
- The app is now available in Bulgarian
- Improved translations

We regularly update the Philips Lumea app for our users to make it even better! Download the latest version now. We don’t want you to miss out! Here are just some of the exciting additions to this latest version:

- Improved onboarding and performance
- The app is now available in Bulgarian
- Improved translations

Due to popular request, we’ve added a long-awaited new feature. Now you can report completed treatments retrospectively. So, if you forget to mark it done on the day of treatment you can also do it later. Don’t miss out! Download the latest version now.

Due to popular request, we’ve added a long-awaited new feature. Now you can report completed treatments retrospectively. So, if you forget to mark it done on the day of treatment you can also do it later. Don’t miss out! Download the latest version now.

This update includes an exciting new feature and extends our support for iPhone. Download this latest version now!

- Due to popular demand: now you can change the interval between 4 to 8 weeks in the touch-up phase, when you own a Lumea Prestige.
- Bug fixes and other improvements.

We’re always looking to improve your experience. Update to the latest version and you'll be able to login easily via your Facebook account. No need to enter your login details anymore!

We’re always looking to improve your experience. In this version we’ve made big changes to the treatment schedule – same great feature but you can get the results you want even more smoothly. Meanwhile, we’ve been busy fixing bugs and improving performance. And we’ve added iOS 13 support in time for its launch this autumn.

We’re always looking to improve your experience. In this version we’ve made big changes to the treatment schedule – same great feature but you can get the results you want even more smoothly. Meanwhile, we’ve been busy fixing bugs and improving performance. And we’ve added iOS 13 support in time for its launch this autumn.

We’re always looking to improve your experience. In this version we’ve made big changes to the treatment schedule – same great feature but you can get the results you want even more smoothly. Meanwhile, we’ve been busy fixing bugs and improving performance. And we’ve added iOS 13 support in time for its launch this autumn.
We’re excited to introduce the ‘explore’ feature which you can use to guide you through each treatment.

Meanwhile, we’ve been busy updating our reminders, fixing bugs and improving performance.

我们始终致力于改善您的体验。更新至全新版本并受益于以下新功能！
- 我们增加了“支持”部分，以防您有任何疑问！
- 从现在开始，您的个人设置会存储在您的个人资料中
- 我们更新了 Lumea Prestige 设备的照片
- 我们增加了新通知，所以您永远不会错过新文章！
- 我们的语言支持已扩展到塞尔维亚语、匈牙利语、斯洛伐克语、斯洛文尼
- 我们会将您的照射详情存储在照射报告中！

- 我们会将您的照射详情存储在照射报告中！

我们始终致力于改善您的体验。更新至全新版本并受益于以下新功能！
- 我们会将您的照射详情存储在照射报告中！
- 在您的照射报告中开始跟踪脱毛效果。
同时，我们致力于更新提醒、修复漏洞和提高性能。

我们始终致力于改善您的体验。更新至全新版本并受益于以下新功能！
- 引入用于选择照射日期的新设计。让您更容易理解最适合您的 Lumea 照射时间
- 您现在可以通过 Apple ID 轻松登录
- 新款 Lumea 设备的新增支持
同时，我们致力于修复漏洞和提高性能。

我们始终致力于改善您的体验。立即下载此最新版本。切勿错过！
我们已基于针对 BRI95x、BRI94x、BRI92x 和 Sc199x 设备最有效使用 Lumea 的相关见解更新了修改间隔。
同时，我们致力于修复漏洞和提高性能。
